body:
Hi Antonello,

I see. I updated the file in my computer to latest LB_HB and then i get the inconsistencies. You can try. The results change. Using the version you uploaded it works fine. So something with the new definitions is messing the results. Here i suppose Mostapha or Chris can assist.

For the first issue (connecting directly EPW) see attached, red circle for a working version in first mode.

-A.
